content: --भावः a fixed or permanent condition of mind, a lasting or permanent feeling; (these feelings being said to give rise to the different {%rasas%} or sentiments in poetry, each {%rasa%} having its own Sthāyibhāva); they are eight or nine; रतिर्हासश्च शोकश्च क्रोधोत्साहौ भयं तथा . जुगुप्सा विस्मयश्चेत्थमष्टौ प्रोक्तः शमोऽपि च <ls>S. D. 206</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> व्यभिचारिभाव, भाव, विभाव also.
